attributes.action: Not force up Council tax beyond inflation to give extra funding to the Police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears in Hampshire the Police have not got enough money to run there operation for 07/08.
They are stating that the public would be prepared to give more in Council tax to fund the Police correctly, this of course is just spin.
Sign the petiton now to let them know that until they get their house in order there will be no more money from the Council tax payers.
